price: Na usiku pia mtakase, na zinapo kuchwa nyota.
footnotes: Na tafuta usiku usiku nafasi ya kumsabihi, yaani kumtakasa, Mwenyezi Mungu, na mtakase pia wakati zinapo kuchwa nyota, yaani alfajiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
